tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE medical_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  record_date DATE,
  diagnosis TEXT,
  treatment TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE PatientData (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    diagnosis TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE TreatmentRecords (
    treatment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    treatment_date DATE,
    doctor_name VARCHAR(50),
    treatment_details TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES PatientData(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE diagnoses (
  diagnosis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  diagnosis TEXT,
  diagnosis_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(id)
);

CREATE TABLE lab_results (
  result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  test_name TEXT,
  result_value FLOAT,
  result_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
    patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name STRING,
    age INT,
    gender STRING,
    diagnosis STRING
)

CREATE TABLE Visits (
    visit_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
    visit_date DATE,
    doctor_id UUID,
    prescription STRING
)

CREATE TABLE Doctors (
    doctor_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    doctor_name STRING,
    specialty STRING,
    hospital_id UUID,
    experience_years INT
)

CREATE TABLE Labs (
    lab_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    lab_name STRING,
    test_name STRING,
    result STRING,
    test_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(15),
    height FLOAT,
    weight FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE treatments (
    treatment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    diagnosis_id INT REFERENCES diagnoses(diagnosis_id),
    treatment_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    treatment_description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE medications (
    medication_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    treatment_id INT REFERENCES treatments(treatment_id),
    medication_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    dosage FLOAT,
    frequency VARCHAR(50),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE lab_results (
    result_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
    lab_test VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    result_value FLOAT,
    result_date DATE
);
